name: Version Record
summary: Learn about .VER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Most users will never see the VER file since they are stored in the installation directory of the software. If a user finds a VER file, he should not move it from the location.

description: A VER file is data file used by various programs, such as Intuit TurboTax and RealNetworks RealPlayer. It contains information that defines the version of a software program. VER files are saved along with the application and is not meant to be opened or edited by the user.
